original_text: And, being assembled together with them, commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which, saith he, ye have heard of me.
korean_text: 사도와 함께 모이사 그들에게 분부하여 이르시되 예루살렘을 떠나지 말고 내게서 들은 바 아버지께서 약속하신 것을 기다리라

sentences.original_text: And, being assembled together with them
that they should not depart from Jerusalem
but wait for the promise of the Father
which, saith he, ye have heard of me
